page.title: 03TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: During the week 10th_14th{June 1985,} Mrs. Catton's class did a traffic survey in{Earith High Street.}Every day of the week between{9.45 am}and{ {10.15 am,}we went to do our{count.} We found on{Monday 134, Tuesday 92, {Wednesday 176, Thursday 57}and{Friday {118 vehicles}passed through. This suggests that Wednesday is the busiest day although we cannot think why, as there is no local market. Monday and Friday were also very busy, being the beginning and end of the week. We also looked at the vehicles registrations and found about{50%}were local{Peterborough}numbers.We found about{20%}of the vehicles were{ {lorries.}We found quite a few{buses, {tractors}and{trailers}on Thursday and Friday. We also saw an{ambulance, {police cars, post office van}and a{ {dust cart. }
